summary.Title: Affiliate Manager (Retention), Ta’ Xbiex, Malta
summary.Presentation: RaiseMyFunds (RaiseFX), Ta’ Xbiex, Malta, is hiring an Affiliate Manager (Retention).Join RaiseMyFunds to engage and nurture our affiliates in the world of proprietary trading firms!Ra

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
RaiseMyFunds (RaiseFX), Ta’ Xbiex, Malta, is hiring an Affiliate Manager (Retention).

Join RaiseMyFunds to engage and nurture our affiliates in the world of proprietary trading firms!

RaiseMyFunds is a prop firm that helps traders achieve performance by providing capital and an optimal trading environment. We are looking for an Affiliate Manager (Retention) to maintain strong relationships with our affiliates and maximize their satisfaction.

Responsibilities:
• Manage and retain existing affiliates by providing tailored support based on their needs.
• Analyse affiliate performance and provide recommendations to maximize results.
• Provide personalised and responsive support to meet affiliate needs.
• Collaborate with affiliates to increase their engagement with the platform.
• Identify opportunities to improve the affiliate program based on industry trends.
• Work closely with marketing and product teams to align strategies.

Requirements
• Experience in affiliate management or client relations, ideally within the trading or prop firm industry.
• Analytical skills to interpret affiliate performance and recommend actions.
• Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
• Knowledge of digital marketing tools is a plus.
• Proficiency in English is a major advantage.

Training provided

Onboarding to the team and the company.
Each manager is responsible for training the new recruit within their respective team. The training will be based on the recruit's job description as well as an introduction to the world of trading.

Any assistance with accommodation/relocation
We regret to inform you that we do not provide assistance with accommodation or relocation

Any other benefits

We offer access to a gym, weekly team events, and breakfast on Monday mornings. Additionally, we have a very flexible leave policy to accommodate our employees' needs.

Salary

A competitive salary range of €21,600 to €24,000 gross fixed annually, depending on your experience.
In addition to the fixed salary, you'll also receive a percentage of the net deposit.

Working hours: Full-time, 40 hours per week, from 10 AM to 7 PM.
Flexible work options, including opportunities for remote or hybrid work.

How will the interviews be held

The first interview will be conducted online, and if successful, the second interview will take place
online with the manager responsible for the respective position.

To apply

CVs and a covering email are to be sent by email to eures.recruitment.jobsplus@gov.mt and should
be written in English. Please quote the vacancy name "Affiliate Manager (Retention)" and number 414084 in your email

Latest application date is 09.02.2025

(from EURES Malta)
